meanings.definition: Not representing speech sounds by single symbols
meanings.sent1: The nonphonetic symbols confused the students in the class.
meanings.sent2: The nonphonetic writing system used pictures instead of letters.
meanings.sent3: The nonphonetic drawings on the wall made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her nonphonetic art was like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The nonphonetic characters were as mysterious as ancient hieroglyphics.

meanings.definition: Not following the rules of pronunciation
meanings.sent1: The nonphonetic pronunciation of his name left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent2: Her accent was so nonphonetic that no one could understand her.
meanings.sent3: The nonphonetic way he said 'hello' made us all giggle.
meanings.sent4: His nonphonetic speech was like a foreign language to us.
meanings.sent5: The nonphonetic sounds coming from the machine were like music to his ears.
